column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2022-03-18 06:03:57+00:00; ;1504700113528098816;en;24;0;2;0;Twitter Web App;"Are there exceptions? There always are.

column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2022-03-18 06:03:56+00:00; ;1504700109925191680;en;16;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"So what can be done?

column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2022-02-23 20:19:10+00:00; ;1496580413359214595;en;82;0;1;6;Twitter for iPhone;"Whenever someone says that to me
column4: I know they didn’t read a word I wrote and I can dismiss them without a word. I’m speaking from my own experience and working out my own reasoning through said experience and observation.

39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism
column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2022-02-23 20:19:09+00:00; ;1496580411971059720;en;82;0;1;8;Twitter for iPhone;"Because broadly speaking
column4: a lot of autistic people have similar experiences and reasoning to my own
column5: so there is value there.

column1: “You don’t speak for all autistic people

By autistic people talking about themselves and their traits and how it manifests. Me
column4: I like to work out why certain traits manifest the way they do.

column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2022-02-23 20:19:09+00:00; ;1496580408456192007;en;117;2;3;8;Twitter for iPhone;"You won’t fit every autistic trait perfectly. Statistically speaking

column5: so ad hoc solutions like twitter are really the best resources for autistic people.

column1: 39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism
column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2022-02-09 00:31:08+00:00; ;1491208007191261185;en;48;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;"Trust me
column4: we've all done a lot of work questioning why we are as we are
column5: and sometimes seeing a prompt like
column6: ""Do you use hot sauce as a stim?"" can make a lot of things running in the back of your mind click.

column1: Asking if it's something else is frustrating at best."
39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism
column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2022-02-09 00:29:24+00:00; ;1491207569594937347;en;67;1;1;6;Twitter Web App;"But regardless
column4: questions like
column5: ""Are you sure this is autism and not something else?"" are frankly offensive
column6: and not the helpful guidance you think.

column1: Autistic existence is all about questioning yourself
column2: because people tell you that you're wrong pretty much from birth."

column4: so they give you an absurdly low interest rate."

column1: 39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism
column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-12-09 03:46:01+00:00; ;1468789000559153152;en;24;0;2;1;Twitter Web App;Being labeled high functioning certainly gives you an advantage
column4: namely some level of agency. But you get accustomed to hiding your support needs from others as they're mocked as ridiculous or dismissed since driving a car is harder than buying pants.

column1: 39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism

column4: what they consider functioning isn't a binary state. It's purely about how much effort others have to put towards supporting you
column5: and whether or not you can provide value in a capitalist society.

column1: Said society places people's worth on that provided value."
39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism
column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. column4: there's a difference between having no agency and being able to demand someone else takes care of it to your liking. Most would hate the former.

But not everyone can do everything
column4: and by labelling your child low functioning and accepting that
column5: you're not even helping them figure out what they can do.

column4: require so much support.

Conservatorships where you have no agency over your life is the most extreme example
column4: but even if there isn't legal backing
column5: parents often control every aspect of their kids lives and don't give them a chance because of that low functioning label.

column1: 39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism
column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-12-09 03:45:52+00:00; ;1468788966174314497;en;18;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"In this case
column4: you need a caretaker
column5: and that's not a bad thing. Humans are communal creatures
column6: nobody is truly self sufficient
column7: and the strongest societies are those that take care of everyone.

column1: But low functioning suggests you're a burden because you need support."
39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism

39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism
column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. column1: 39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism

column1: 39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism

column4: but they might go completely non-verbal when under duress

column1: 39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism

column1: 39879246;MaxieMoosie;Autistic Max;#ActuallyAutistic. Self DX is valid. Tweets autism

column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-23 00:36:43+00:00; ;1462943158149341191;en;6;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"Other examples of trauma dumping? Online

column3: and random shit with the occasional double-wocka joke. No NFT or Crypto please. He/Him;31103;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-23 00:36:43+00:00; ;1462943156639449090;en;7;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"Going over the same event ad nauseam is a pretty normal
